Posts.Content: Dec 14, 2010 01:32AM TonyaN wrote: Yes one thing I have learned on this Journey is my man loves me.  I'm going to try to hang in there and hope in the end I'll be fine, but should I change my mind and say enough is enough I know my man will be right there providing me love and support.  It took BC and all these surgeries for me to really know how much I am loved.
